commentary: There seriously, absolutely non-jokingly, were a bunch of unfathomable rubes out there who thought that Kanaya was so upset watching this kiss because she had a crush on TAVROS. If you've never given any thought to the kind of bullshit I've had to deal with, the absolutely limitless undulating gascloud of human stupidity that I've  been exposed to, please consider this cursed tale of woe I have shared before you speak another word. Then some day, consider placing a bouquet of sympathy on my grave, while arranging a twenty-one-gun salute nearby.
